price: “Gooftaa kiyya! Hanga guyyaa kaafamaatti na tursiisi” jedhe.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرۡنِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi fa-anẓir'nī ilā yawmi yub'ʿathūna
